statements: SELECT id, location, congestion_level, road_closure FROM traffic_data
SELECT location, congestion_level, road_closure, id FROM traffic_data
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level > 2
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE road_closure = TRUE
SELECT id, location, road_closure FROM traffic_data ORDER BY congestion_level DESC
SELECT id, location, congestion_level, road_closure FROM traffic_data WHERE road_closure = TRUE;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level, road_closure FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level >= 3 AND road_closure = FALSE ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level > 2;
SELECT road_name, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE closure_start_date >= '2022-05-01' AND closure_end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT road_name, closure_reason, closure_start_date, closure_end_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason = 'Accident' ORDER BY closure_start_date DESC;
SELECT road_name, COUNT(*) AS total_closures FROM road_closures GROUP BY road_name HAVING total_closures > 1;
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels ORDER BY road_name ASC, congestion_level DESC
SELECT road_name, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level > 5
SELECT road_name, COUNT(*) AS total_congestion_reports FROM congestion_levels GROUP BY road_name
SELECT road_name, closure_reason, closure_start_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_end_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY closure_start_date DESC
SELECT road_name, AVG(congestion_level) AS avg_congestion_level FROM congestion_levels GROUP BY road_name HAVING AVG(congestion_level) > 3
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level > 2
SELECT location FROM congestion_levels WHERE location LIKE 'A%'
SELECT road_name, closure_reason FROM road_closures ORDER BY road_name DESC
SELECT map_id FROM map_interface WHERE map_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level = 1 ORDER BY location
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level > 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT road_name, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason LIKE '%accident%' ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM map_interface WHERE map_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT road_name, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason NOT NULL AND road_name LIKE 'Main%' ORDER BY road_name DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level <= 3 OR location = 'Highway 101';
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels WHERE location = 'Downtown'
SELECT road_name, closure_reason, start_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason = 'Construction'
SELECT id, image_url, last_updated FROM map_interface_data WHERE map_id = 5
SELECT update_text FROM traffic_updates WHERE update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT location, level, timestamp FROM congestion_levels ORDER BY level DESC
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, level FROM congestion_levels WHERE level > 3
SELECT road_name, closure_reason, start_date FROM road_closures WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT map_id, map_url FROM map_interface_data WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT update_text, update_timestamp FROM traffic_updates ORDER BY update_timestamp
SELECT * FROM congestion_levels ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, road_name, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT map_location, map_image_url FROM map_interface WHERE id = 3;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT id, camera_location FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_levels WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT road_name, closure_reason, closure_start_date FROM road_closures WHERE closure_end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY closure_end_date ASC;
SELECT map_location, map_image_url FROM map_interface WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT camera_location, camera_url FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_location LIKE '%highway%' ORDER BY camera_location ASC;
